required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Interest of the Immunoscore® as a Post-operative Complementary Tool for the Detection of the Risk of Recurrence in Patients With Nonmetastatic Colorectal Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Interest of the Immunoscore® as a Post-operative Complementary Tool for the Detection of the Risk of Recurrence in Patients With Nonmetastatic Colorectal Cancer : Prospective Cohort Comparing the Recommandation for Patient Care According to the Immunoscore® With the Standard Care Decision.

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluate the patient care recommandation induced by the IMMUNOSCORE® result

primary_outcome.measure: Number of cases where the recommendations for patient care according to the Immunoscore® are considered beneficial compared to the standard care decision

secondary_outcome.description: Number of cases where the Immunoscore® resultat is inconsistent with the RER phenotype
Number of cases where the Immunoscore® resultat is inconsistent with the KRAS, NRAS and BRAF mutations

secondary_outcome.measure: Ratio of ciruclating tumor DNA level
secondary_outcome.description: Number of cases where the Immunoscore® resultat is inconsistent with the ratio of ciruclating tumor DNA level

secondary_outcome.measure: Actual survival (patient alive without recurrence, alive with recurrence, dead)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of cases where the Immunoscore® resultat is inconsistent with the actual survival

intervention.description: recommendation for patient care according to the result of the IMMUNOSCORE®
